EmailTemplate.description: Cover note to Minister Shatter with formatting
EmailTemplate.name: Annual report briefing Min Shatter
EmailTemplate.subject: FLAC Briefing on Annual Report 2011 - Thurs 5 July
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Minister,
Thank you again for launching FLAC’s Annual Report for 2011 at our office on Dorset Street last Monday, we were delighted with how the event went.
As a result of this, your colleague Deputy Alan Farrell has kindly arranged for FLAC to do a briefing to TDs and Senators in the AV Room next week. At this briefing, FLAC will present on various aspects of its work and will answer any questions arising.
Date: Thursday 5 July 2012
Time: 11am – 12pm
Location: AV Room, Leinster House
If you or one of your colleagues are available to attend, we would be delighted to see you there.
We are putting together the photos from last week’s event and will send them on to you when we have them.
Kind regards
Noeline
Noeline Blackwell
Director General
FLAC (Free Legal Advice Centres Ltd.)
13 Lr Dorset Street, Dublin 1
Tel: (353) 1-874 5690 Fax: (353) 1-874 532
LoCall: 1890-350 250 Web: http://www.flac.ie
Free Legal Advice Centres Ltd is a company limited by guarantee not having a share capital, registered in Dublin, Ireland. Company registration number 49413. Directors: Don Crewe, Paul O'Connell, Iseult O'Malley, Peter Ward, Róisín Webb
NB: The information in this e-mail may be confidential and may be legally privileged. It is intended for the listed addressee(s). Access to this e-mail by anyone else is unauthorised. If you are not the intended recipient, any distribution, copying, or other actions taken in reliance on it are prohibited and may be unlawful. The opinions and advice contained in this e-mail may not be those of FLAC.
************************************
FLAC – promoting access to justice http://www.flac.ie
